testcase.classname: Swaglabs login fuctionality in web application
testcase.name: Login fuctionality of the application
testcase.system-out: Given user launches swag "https://www.saucedemo.com/" application...........passed When user enter the user name in user textbox...............................passed When user enter the password in pass textbox................................passed And user clicks the login button............................................passed Then user verifies the product homepage.....................................passed
